overview:
Applicant Tracking System

The ATS module automates the development of job requisitions and postings, candidate searches, applicant screening, ranking and assessment. Applicant Tracking Software, utilizes our own Talentflow engine to power any companyâ€™s corporate career page!

TalentFlow addresses the needs for a fully featured, career web-site management system, while maintaining your own private, secure database of candidates.

Functions Simplifies recruiting by automating the administrative process, the sourcing, screening, and matching of candidates and the management of resumes all designed to increase the efficiency and productivity of recruiters. http://www.talentflow.com/
